name: aamarPay
standInfo: Stand No - H8-B213, Hall No - Hall 8
description:
About us:
aamarPay is a top-ranking FinTech company in Bangladesh that provides payment gateway solutions for SME as well as large corporations. We provide accepting Local & International payments through different payment methods.
Mission: 
Aiming to bring a true cashless society through the inclusion of financial technology.
Vision: 
Our objective is to tailor a world class fintech & enterprise solution to the needs of SME & large organizations by providing tech resources they need to flourish today.
Products: 
Payment Gateway- A trusted gateway ensuring secured & hassle-free transaction process.
Super App- Numerous services and functions through a single application that allows online payment through it.
Merchant App- Payment dashboard for monitoring daily transaction, payment settlement, generating invoice, etc.
QR Payments- QR codes that contain payment information to make a payment.
Certification: 
PSO, ISO-27001, PCI-DSS, ITEX- 23 Gold Award, SIIF-23 Gold Award

standInfo: Stand No - H8-B212, Hall No - Hall 8

Welcome to AamarTech LLC, where we provide comprehensive technology solutions tailored to your business needs. In today's fast-paced digital world, businesses require more than isolated IT services; they need integrated solutions to remain competitive and secure. Experience the future of technology today with AamarTech's 360 IT solutions. Your IT, Your Vision, Our Solutions!

name: AB Ark Private Limited
standInfo: Stand No - H2-G14, Hall No - Hall 2
description:
AB Ark  Private Limited is a dynamic and innovative company specializing in AI-powered products and cutting-edge software solutions tailored to meet the evolving needs of businesses. 
Our mission is to go beyond traditional IT services, aiming to build long-term partnerships and become the trusted digital transformation partner for businesses. As technology continues to reshape industries, AB Ark is committed to delivering cutting-edge solutions that enhance efficiency, productivity, and competitiveness.

name: Abajim
standInfo: Stand No - H3-F04, Hall No - Hall 3
description: Abajim is a unique Educational tech (EdTech) platform that aims to transform the way we learn from traditional learning tools. Abajim bridges the gap between modern learning and conventional teaching methods by converting old school textbooks into immersive, interactive digital experiences. Teachers can make video lessons based on sections out of a particular textbook using different pedagogical models that are catered to the student getting each lesson.

name: Abillio
standInfo: Stand No - H8-C50, Hall No - Hall 8
description:
Abillio is a SaaS platform for cross-border payments and tax compliance, enabling freelancers to invoice globally without a company and helping businesses manage contractor payments worldwide.

Abillio's company-as-a-service solution simplifies cross-border invoicing, VAT, income tax management, and global payments for freelancers. 

Abillio's Freelancer Management System for businesses helps with compliance, payments and contractor onboarding, legal documentation. We provide fast payments to contingent workforce globally, globally recognised invoices, invoice consolidation (bulk payments), multiple currency & crypto payouts.

API solution for Digital Platform Operators
Our API integration handles freelancer onboarding (KYC & AML), collects reportable freelancer data, processes global payments, generates, and submits DAC7 and 1099 reports. By leveraging our solution, businesses can focus on their core priorities without allocating internal resources to manage payments and compliance.

name: ABSOLIN
standInfo: Stand No - H8-B112, H8-B113, Hall No - Hall 8
description:
SAP (Société d'Application de Peinture), based in Rochefort (France) since 1830, is mainly engaged in the application of paint, wallpaper, wall and floor coverings. The activity is mainly divided into 3 sectors: heritage maintenance, renovation and rehabilitation, and new constructions. 
After committing to a CSR (Corporate social responsibility) approach in 2021 with a view to acting responsibly to meet sustainable development objectives, the company has introduced the use of recycled paint or  biobased paints emitting 0% Volatile Organic Compounds (VOC), as well as the sorting and recycling of waste.
To develop its activities and pursue its eco-responsible approach, SAP has created a research and development unit. The new mission of the company is to develop biosourced products for the construction. A family of coatings based on mineral and plant-based materials was developed. These coatings for walls and ceilings offer interesting performances such as acoustic and thermal comfort.

name: ACATE
standInfo: Stand No - H6-E20, Hall No - Hall 6
description: Since 1986, the Santa Catarina Association of Technology Companies (ACATE) has worked to promote the development of the technology sector in the State of Santa Catarina. Throughout its activities, ACATE has established itself as one of the main interlocutors of technology companies in Santa Catarina with municipal, state and federal public authorities, as well as other representative entities and institutions in the technology sector, not only in Santa Catarina, but in Brazil and globally.

name: Ace Aeronautics
standInfo: Stand No - H8-C75, Hall No - Hall 8
description:
Ace Aeronautics is a pioneering startup specializing in collision-resilient drones with embedded AI capabilities. Founded to revolutionize the aerospace industry, we quickly gained recognition for our innovative solutions. Our drones excel in challenging environments, ensuring safety and reliability for industrial inspections, emergency response, and more.

In just eight months, we’ve achieved notable milestones: winning the P@SHA ICT Gold Award for Best in Engineering and Construction in Pakistan, the APICTA Merit Award across 16 countries, and 1st Prize at the PEC Federal Engineering Capstone Competition. Our research was also showcased at the International Astronautical Congress (IAC) in Baku, sparking significant industry excitement.

At Ace Aeronautics, we're committed to advancing aerial robotics and aerospace technologies. Our dedicated team continually innovates, keeping our drones at the cutting edge of technology. Join us in redefining the future of drone technology.

name: Baiya Phytopharm. Co., Ltd
standInfo: Stand No - H1-E51, Hall No - Hall 1
description: Baiya Phytopharm founded in 2018 a spin-off Chulalongkorn University, was co-founded by Waranyoo Phoolcharoen, expert in plant-produced proteins, Suthira Taychakhoonavudh, an expert in health economics. Company focuses on creating impactful biopharmaceutical solutions through proprietary BaiyaPharming™ plant-based technology to produce recombinant therapeutic proteins. Strategic goals, building strong product pipeline to address unmet medical needs in oncology non-oncology, brain metastases, RSV infection, asthma, CDMO/CRO services via MP Solution, commercializing products industries like alternative meats, cosmetics, gene therapy through BGF Plantrix. Baiya Phytopharm's production facility became the first cGMPcertified plant-based technology facility in Asia. Within 40 months of its founding, company became a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical firm, with its candidate molecule entering a first-in-human trial in 2021, making it one of the fastest-growing biotech companies in the region.

name: BALA AATRAL SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
standInfo: Stand No - H1-C20, Hall No - Hall 1
description:
Aatral delivers innovative XR solutions to enhance enterprise training, productivity, and engagement. Our mission is to empower operations through XR technologies, aiming to be a global leader. Aatral addresses industry challenges like machinery breakdowns, high costs, safety hazards, and training inefficiencies with tailored XR experiences.

Our core products are:

Aatral Learn: Immersive safety and operational training that recreates scenarios to improve situational awareness.
Aatral Aid: Real-time audits and inspections, reducing costs and eliminating wastage through digital checklists and smart devices.
Aatral Aura: Enhances customer interaction via virtual walkthroughs and personalized experiences.
Aatral has partnered with clients in power, infrastructure, manufacturing, and defense, deploying 40+ experiences and training 10,000+ users. Focused on innovation, we enable informed decisions and operational optimization.

name: BALANCE
standInfo: Stand No - H5-E24, Hall No - Hall 5
description:
Balance is a mobile platform dedicated to revolutionizing health and wellness. We connect users with certified personal trainers and nutritionists, offering personalized fitness and nutrition solutions. Our goal is to make healthy living accessible and convenient for everyone.

Key Features: 
1. Certified Trainers & Nutritionists:
Browse through a diverse pool of professionals with full visibility into their experience and pricing.
2. Seamless Communication: 
Easily communicate, set online meetings, and schedule sessions within the app.
3. Progress Tracking: 
Monitor and save progress data to stay on track with your health goals.
4. Exclusive Discounts: 
Access special offers at diet restaurants and gyms.


Our Vision:
We strive to provide everyone with the tools for a balanced, healthy life through our user-friendly, affordable platform.

Contact Us
Email: info.appbalance@gmail.com

name: BANGALORE BIOINNOVATION CENTRE
standInfo: Stand No - H1-B74, H1-B75, Hall No - Hall 1
description: The Bangalore Bioinnovation Centre (BBC) is a joint initiative of the Department of IT, BT and S&T, Government of Karnataka, and the Department of Biotechnology (DBT), Government of India aimed at nurturing innovation and entrepreneurship across various domains of life sciences, including Healthcare, Medtech, Pharmaceutical, Agriculture, food, and nutrition, Industrial biotechnology, Integrated Veterinary, Bio-IT, Bio-Electronics, Blue economy, sustainability, Clean and Climate tech. BBC provides cutting-edge infrastructure, specialized equipment, mentorship, networking opportunities, and funding support to biotech startups and entrepreneurs. We foster collaborations among academia, industry, and government bodies and play a crucial role in nurturing the growth of biotech startups, accelerating the development of new biotech products and technologies, and contributing to the overall growth of the biotechnology ecosystem in India.

name: BangProof
standInfo: Stand No - H8-C10, Hall No - Hall 8
description: BangProof® is a European Union-based company designing and manufacturing innovative, CE EN 1385 certified soft-shell helmets for watersports.  These lightweight, stylish helmets offer superior impact protection.  Their "adaptive absorption" technology ensures the helmets are soft during rest but harden upon impact, protecting against multiple hits.  Praised for comfort and style, they're used by professional watersports athletes and suitable for everyday users.  BangProof offers "Buckets" and "Caps" style helmets .  They provide cut-resistant protection and are designed for various water sports including kiteboarding, wakeboarding, wakeskating, surfing, canoeing, and foiling . The company's commitment to innovation is evident in their design, and their numerous awards include winning "The Hottest European Startup" award .

name: Barboleta
standInfo: Stand No - H8-C43, Hall No - Hall 8
description:
Barboleta, Social Enterprise create an innovative environment for children and adults to reach productivity in learning and daily work. Barboleta founder is an expert in clinical, cognitive psychology and  Education field, created the app connected to a wooden balance board to improve movement, memory, and attention span for children and adults. 
The DigiBarboleta app supports iOS and Android. The app has more than 1000 tasks related to language, maths, perception and attention. The app requires a balance board by Barboleta. The app is operated by co-ordination of balance and movement on a wooden balance board.
The product is used by families with children aged 3-10, schools, kindergartens, development centres. The product can be used by office workers for wellbeing activities, to promote focus and productivity. Potential partners include children's shops, schools, clinics, development centres, offices, banks, etc.

standInfo: Stand No - H5-D25, Hall No - Hall 5
description: Bareeq is envisioned as a transformative mobile application designed to revolutionize the way home-based businesses connect with their customers. In an era where the digital marketplace is increasingly crowded, Bareeq stands out by offering a dedicated platform that not only simplifies business operations for entrepreneurs but also enhances the shopping experience for consumers. Our mission is to empower these small-scale businesses by providing them with the tools they need to thrive in a competitive digital landscape, thereby fostering economic growth and community building

name: CAAX
standInfo: Stand No - H6-C22, Hall No - Hall 6
description: Xboson AI is a tech company that provides intelligent solutions to food security in resource-limited areas using advanced AI tools. Its flagship product, CAAX, is a personal food computing platform that allows users to grow leafy plants in compact spaces with minimal water and energy. By leveraging hydroponic technology and AI-driven automation, CAAX optimizes plant growth, enabling year-round cultivation of fresh, pesticide-free produce. Xboson AI’s mission is to revolutionize food production by making it more accessible, efficient, and sustainable. Through innovation, sustainability, and collaboration, Xboson AI empowers individuals and communities to grow their own food, enhancing global food security and promoting healthier lifestyles. The company envisions a future where fresh, nutritious food is available to all, regardless of location or resources, and is actively expanding its impact through research, partnerships, and education.

Electronic Components (Connection Devices, Electron Tubes, Etc)

name: Callio
standInfo: Stand No - H1-E56, Hall No - Hall 1
description: The story of Callio started three years ago in 2020 when the Gadget team set out to solve a big problem with our client, a fast-growing Edutech company dealing with thousands of outbound telesales calls and a few dozen telesales agents. Based on the tremendous success of that project, we have leveraged Callio with many sales-focus features into a full-fledged omi-channel CRM system, differentiating ourselves from the market or CRM system as the first interactive sales-focused CRM in Vietnam. We aim to democratize the CRM tool to empower micro to medium sales businesses to thrive and compete with even deeper-pocket incumbents.
sectors: Customer Relationship & Experience Management - CRM & CEM

name: Cambium Networks
standInfo: Stand No - H8-B87, H8-B88, Hall No - Hall 8
description: Cambium Networks is a renown American manufacturer, with more than 25 years of existence, resulting from the radio frequency activity of Motorola, listed on the stock exchange since 2019, world leader in wireless communication solutions, from 2 meters to 200 km, connecting the unconnected: people, places and things. With its extensive portfolio of secure, flexible and reliable broadband and narrowband radio links and its offering of professional Wi-Fi access points, Cambium Networks enables all IT service providers and networks operators, to offer end-to-end, seamless, high-performance, and affordable wireless connectivity infrastructures. Cambium equipment is currently used by thousands of demanding networks in more than 150 countries. Established in the Chicago area, Cambium Networks relies on a wide range of distributors on a global scale, with relays in all countries around the world, including very broad coverage in the Middle East.

name: Canada Startup Association
standInfo: Stand No - H8-B32, Hall No - Hall 8
description: Canada Startup Association (CSA) empowers entrepreneurs with resources, mentorship, and a strong network to navigate and succeed—globally. CSA serves as a catalyst for innovation and business growth, providing tailored support for immigrant founders to help them build sustainable ventures. With a focus on fostering inclusivity, we connect entrepreneurs with industry experts, investors, and accelerators, offering access to exclusive programs and funding opportunities. Our initiatives span international markets, bridging the gap between diverse communities and the Canadian startup ecosystem. From ideation to scaling, we guide founders at every stage of their journey, ensuring they have the tools and insights needed to thrive in a competitive landscape. At CSA, we believe in creating impactful change by driving entrepreneurial success and enabling global connections, one founder at a time.

name: CaneBOT
standInfo: Stand No - H1-B79, Hall No - Hall 1
description:
CaneBOT is a pioneering AgriTech startup that has developed the world’s first fully automated fresh sugarcane juice vending machine. Our technology-driven solution ensures complete hygiene, operational efficiency, and scalability. While sugarcane juice is our first application, we have a roadmap to extend our technology to serve other natural juices and smoothies, catering to the growing demand for healthy and fresh beverages. We aim to revolutionize the traditional juice market by offering a modern, compact, and autonomous solution that benefits consumers, farmers, and entrepreneurs alike.

Unlike existing manual setups, CaneBOT offers a completely automated, compact, and sustainable solution. It reduces capital expenditure by 80% due to its efficient design and operation. Additionally, it goes beyond just providing juice by creating a circular economy: converting sugarcane waste into biofuel.
sectors: Consumer Tech, Smart Home & Smart Workplace

name: CARBOTECH DYNAMICS
standInfo: Stand No - H8-C75, Hall No - Hall 8
description: Carbotech Dynamics tackles aerospace composites challenges like buckling and impact damage through advanced composites manufacturing. As Pakistan’s pioneer in nanoparticles manufacturing technology, we've developed "Graphene Nano Layers Incorporated Enhanced Interlaminar Shear Strength Carbon Fibre-Al Laminates" for aerospace and automotive applications. Our start-up focuses on sustainable, local manufacturing of advanced composites, nanoparticles and additive manufacturing. We are also working and will be launching our own manufactured VTOL UAV for surveillance, area mapping, and LIDAR with a 5-10kg payload. Embracing our motto, "Innovate Without Boundaries," we leverage our R&D and manufacturing capabilities to drive cutting-edge solutions and sustainability in technology.
sectors: Design & Product Development - Engineering and part design
Materials - Metals, Polymers, Ceramics, Biomaterials, Additives, Binders

name: CardByte AI Private Limited
standInfo: Stand No - H1-C20, Hall No - Hall 1
description:
CardByte AI is a SaaS contact management and networking platform that streamlines organizing and exchanging professional contacts. Our Digital Business Card solution allows users to create, store, and share digital cards effortlessly, eliminating the need for physical cards. With features like business card scanner, quickly digitize physical cards for easy search and organization.
Key Features:
- Create and customize digital business cards
- Quickly digitize physical cards
- Real-time categorization and updates
- Integration with CRM, Email, and HRMS
- Follow-up reminders and tags
- Add notes to enhance connections
- Promote sustainability by reducing paper waste
Vision:To be the global leader in transformative contact management solutions.
Mission:To develop innovative products that empower businesses to harness the power of relationships.
Team:Navinn Kapur, Alok Jain, and Dhruv bring a wealth of experience in entrepreneurship and technology, driving CardByte AI’s mission forward.

name: Care&Co
standInfo: Stand No - H1-D20, Hall No - Hall 1
description:
Due to lifestyle changes and aging, innovative healthcare solutions are needed for daily health management. For musculoskeletal disease prevention, visit our booth to experience Fisica.
Care&Co. Inc. offers body health analysis technology that replaces X-rays, making health management accessible to everyone. Our service, Fisica, uses the Fisica Scale and a dedicated app for health analysis. Fisica employs AI and 3D simulation for body health. The Fisica Scale measures foot pressure, and the app visualizes the data to suggest symptoms and management methods. Users can share health data with experts for remote counseling and book customized health services. The app also supports group health management and offers specialized services for children’s growth and senior care.

name: D'isum Inc.
standInfo: Stand No - H9-B190, Hall No - Hall 9
description:
D’isum is a technology start-up established in Japan in October 2019 to help people to better identify a variety of risks by using big data analysis. Our proprietary and patented visualization AI technology ‘D’Insight’ visualizes every kind of risk in an easy-to-understand two-dimensional chart, enabling users to recognize risks largely invisible to the human eye. Our technology can be applied in many fields including machine failure prediction, product quality maintenance, monitoring of unauthorized access to computers, detecting fraudulent financial transactions, and in healthcare.
One of the products that we have been focusing on developing is a SAS (Sleep Apnea Syndrome) screening smartphone application. There said to be over 4 million people has SAS globally. While SAS itself is not a fatal disease, it causes several serious diseases including heart diseases and diabetes. Our easy-to-use smartphone application enables people to check whether they have SAS or not easily.

name: DA STUDIO DMCC
standInfo: Stand No - H2-L09, H2-L10, Hall No - Hall 2
description:
DA Studio is a full-service digital agency offering innovative solutions for businesses looking to strengthen their online presence. Our expertise covers website development, mobile app creation, and user-focused UI/UX design. From concept to launch, we ensure that every platform we build is designed for optimal performance, user experience, and security.

In addition to development, we provide IT staff augmentation, social media management, and branding services, ensuring our clients have the right talent and strategies to achieve their digital objectives. Our team is dedicated to delivering solutions that are adaptable and tailored to your specific needs.

By focusing on integration and quality design, we bring your vision to life, whether you’re launching a website, developing a mobile app, or running a digital marketing campaign. DA Studio works with you to achieve lasting success in today’s fast-changing digital environment.

name: DABIDA Corp.
standInfo: Stand No - H1-F20, Hall No - Hall 1
description: DABIDA is a cutting-edge technology company specializing in AI-powered educational solutions designed to transform the learning experience. Our key products include GENICLASS, a WebRTC-based platform enabling real-time, interactive learning sessions across devices without additional software, and GENIPEN, a WebBLE smart pen that digitizes handwriting in real-time for seamless integration into digital environments. Additionally, GENITUTOR, powered by GPT-4o, offers personalized learning paths and real-time feedback based on data analytics. DABIDA has successfully partnered with global educational institutions in countries like Korea, Spain, France, and the U.S. to revolutionize education by bridging traditional and digital learning methods. With 16 international certifications and proven product performance, DABIDA is poised for further international expansion.

name: Daiki co ltd?Blockza?

The Landscape

Nigeria boasts over 41 million Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs), making up about 96% of all businesses in the country. These MSMEs contribute 50% to the GDP and provide nearly 86% of jobs.

However, the reality is stark—80% of small businesses fail within the first 18 months. The reasons?

GAAP’s Mission

We understand that starting and running a business in Nigeria is tough. That’s why GAAP aims to change that 80% failure rate and help our customers expand beyond borders.

GAAP has evolved from a simple giveaway service to a platform helping business owners thrive globally.

We will  dominate Nigeria, overcome Africa and the world shall carry out flag.

name: Healers
standInfo: Stand No - H8-B293, Hall No - Hall 8
description:
we are Healers, and our project is titled "New Technology for Opening and Closing the Sternum Bone.
Over 700,000 chest surgeries, including complex lung and heart procedures, are performed annually in the U.S. Currently, surgeons cut the sternum with considerable force, causing over 21,000 injuries and leading to 4,000 unfortunate deaths each year. They use metal wires to reconnect the bone, which often leads to infections, fractures, and prolonged pain for the patients involved.
Our innovative solution is a device called "Qas" that cuts the sternum in stronger shapes and utilizes dissolvable stitches. We have a proof of concept in place, complete with designs that effectively reduce stress on the bone. The market potential for our device is immense, estimated to be worth over hundreds of millions.
Our dedicated team includes three talented engineers, all collaborating closely to ensure the success of this project.

The problem of energy inefficiency and underutilized data in urban environments. By transforming everyday kinetic activities into clean, renewable energy and leveraging IoT and AI technologies, we aim to reduce reliance on traditional energy sources while optimizing energy generation, storage, and usage through data-driven insights.


I-N-TECH's solution is to harness kinetic energy from everyday movements—such as vehicles on roads, people in gyms, and fluid in pipes—and convert it into clean, renewable power. We integrate this energy generation with IoT-enabled smart infrastructure that uses AI to optimize energy efficiency and collect valuable data.

name: Kanz
standInfo: Stand No - H8-B289, Hall No - Hall 8
description:
Globally, over 60% of adults struggle to access financial products due to a highly fragmented lending process, resulting in limited transparency, long approval times, suboptimal borrowing decisions, and generally high costs. For lenders, this fragmentation leads to higher operational expenses, unclear creditworthiness assessments, and missed opportunities with potential customers.

By leveraging machine learning algorithms, Kanz streamlines the financing process by automating data extraction and collection, risk analysis, and pricing. This reduces costs for lenders, improves borrower profile accuracy, speeds up approvals, and enables more informed lending decisions, resulting in lower capital costs, higher approval rates, reduced default risk, and improved customer acquisition.

Kanz also promotes financial inclusion by simplifying access to finance and offering tools to boost transparency. Its social media also engages and educates, benefiting both lenders and borrowers.

name: PAL (Pneumatic Aid Launcher)
standInfo: Stand No - H5-C21, Hall No - Hall 5
description:
PAL, a product and company led by sophomore high-school students, was created with the goal of winning the Al Mawakeb high-school science fair of 2024, which it did with flying colors. And it did so for good reason!

PAL's unique design is like no other, it brings a new approach to the industry of emergency aid delivery. Unlike previous solutions to delivering aid, PAL propels aid cartridges in the air using the rapid release of highly pressurized air into a cannon shaft.

PAL uses a car battery to power a pressurizer which fills up a pressure chamber with compressed air. When the target pressure is reached, the pressurized air in the pressure chamber is rapidly released into the firing shaft with the turn of a valve. The result is the projectile being fired at extremely high velocities to cover long distances. The air resistance resulting from the blast pulls out the parachute and allows the aid to fall safely on the ground in the desired destination.

standInfo: Stand No - H8-B120, H8-B121, Hall No - Hall 8
description:
Qista is a French company founded in 2014, specializing in ecological mosquito control through the use of smart traps. These traps function with CO2 and an olfactory lure to simulate human presence. We are able to reduce mosquito nuisance by up to 88% within a 60-meter radius around the device, with a selectivity rate exceeding 99.99%.

Qista's mosquito control solution serves a dual purpose: the traps not only reduce mosquito populations by capturing them, but also, through our real-time monitoring technology, they identify the most infested areas in a city. This data enables us to advise local authorities on how to prevent large-scale mosquito outbreaks and focus their efforts where they are most needed.

Today we have more 13000 traps installed in 36 countries.

name: Raasa Karts India Pvt Ltd
standInfo: Stand No - H1-C75, Hall No - Hall 1
description:
The Indian food service market is projected to reach $130 billion by 2030, with an even split between the organized (hotels, restaurants, QSRs) and unorganized sectors (street food vendors). While the organized sector is largely digitalized, the unorganized sector remains predominantly offline. 

There are currently 2 million street food vendors in India generating over $20 billion annually, yet more than 95% of them lack an online presence.

Most platforms overlook these vendors due to their low Average Order Value, which creates a significant opportunity for Raasa Karts. We launched a street food delivery app, perhaps the first of its kind in India, that’s easy to use, can be available in local languages, and offers same-day payments along with third-party delivery riders & with 25 minutes of SLA. This app provides street vendors with their first digital connection to expand their businesses, offering them proper guidance and support for long-term growth.

description:
Yalla Designs is a cutting-edge, subscription-based platform that streamlines the design process by helping clients provide clear, concise briefs while allowing designers to focus on what they do best—creativity. 

Powered by AI, Yalla Designs ensures that the briefing process is faster and more efficient, reducing miscommunication and delivering high-quality results. Whether you're a business needing design services or a creative professional seeking to optimize your workflow, Yalla Designs is the ultimate tool for transforming your design process and delivering exceptional results.

The product is a brainchild of our amazing designers at IFA Digital and our servicing team that always felt a gap in this area.

name: Yalla Farha
standInfo: Stand No - H6-F32, Hall No - Hall 6
description: Our mission is to support and achieve social solidarity and facilitating the process of the people getting married, having weddings and other happy events by taking advantage of the development of technology in order to transform, hence, advance the traditional process of “gifting” during those happy events, along with encouraging youth to get married by supporting the newlyweds into having an option to start their married life with the least material/financial obligations possible. Yalla Farha allows you to share wish lists with friends and family members to get the desired gifts on those special occasions like weddings, birthdays, and many other occasions with an innovative concept.

name: Yapiee LLC
standInfo: Stand No - H4-A09, Hall No - Hall 4
description: YAPIEE is a revolutionary App transforming global influencer-brand collaborations. Powered by AI-driven influencer matching, real-time location tracking and multilingual support (English, Arabic, French, German, Spanish, Italian), Yapiee facilitates seamless partnerships. Brands create tailored offers, visible only to relevant influencers based on criteria like age, location, follower count and more. Influencers on Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Facebook and Twitter connect with brands via personalized deals, live chat and detailed ROI analytics. Yapiee operates in the UAE, with a strong user base in Dubai and plans to expand to Europe by the end of 2024. With a mobile-first approach (iOS and Android), Yapiee is FREE to download and use. It offers a secure marketplace with in-App reviews, pop-up videos for brand promotion and robust tools for managing collaborations. Yapiee is reshaping influencer marketing by making partnerships efficient, authentic and highly impactful.

name: YEO Messaging
standInfo: Stand No - H2-F12, Hall No - Hall 2
description:
YEO Messaging offers secure communication with end-to-end encryption, continuous facial recognition, geofencing, voice and video calls, and secure payments. YEO’s advanced security features set it apart.

YEO Business provides a customisable, white-label communication solution, emphasising data sovereignty for enhanced compliance and control. Tailored to meet the unique needs of enterprises, it ensures secure, scalable, and compliant operations.

Our Continuous Facial Recognition SDK integrates cutting-edge security into existing platforms, delivering reliable user verification, and safeguarding sensitive information.

YEO is dedicated to providing secure, seamless, and private communication solutions for individuals and organisations, driving innovation and trust in the digital age. 

Privacy. Security. Control. YEO for your eyes only.

name: Yesautomate Solutions LLP
standInfo: Stand No - H1-C20, Hall No - Hall 1
description:
Yesautomate is a SAAS automation firm, where we develop customised solutions (BOTs) to automate Finance and Accounts processes.

We train BOTs to replicate human actions and operate without any human intervention. These BOTs are easy to deploy and simple to scale.

Our expertise includes processes like Data Entry, Reconciliation and Reporting. 

Select project delivered : 
- Vendor Invoice Processing
- Feeding data into ERP
- MIS preparation
- Customer/Vendor Balance Reconciliations
- Excel Transformations & Computations
- Interactive Dashboards

We have automated processes that involved leading tools like Quickbooks, Xero, SAP, Oracle, Zoho, Bill, Gusto, Tally, Shopify, Finnone and many others.

Offload your HIGH EFFORT, LOW IMPACT processes to us, and Focus on more HIGH VALUE jobs and SCALE your businesses.

We are working extensively with CPA firms, global companies and funds helping them in digital transformation to a meaningful growth in productivity and revenues.

name: YogaAmie
standInfo: Stand No - H1-C93, Hall No - Hall 1
description:
1. Yogaamie is an AI-powered Ayurvedic Wellness Coach designed to help people around the world attain a healthy and holistic lifestyle
2. Our AI bot provides suggestions on ancient Ayurvedic techniques to heal/improve medical conditions and our partner wellness experts and centers help the individual with the required guidance
3. Based on the techniques suggested users will have the ability to log and record their activities and see the improvement in their conditions. 
4. Our platform will eventually allow the wellness experts and centers to showcase their content on the platform marketing it directly to the audience.
5. We are working on the concept of building "OnlyFans" for wellness experts and centers in India

name: YSpot
standInfo: Stand No - H6-F37, Hall No - Hall 6
description: Yspot has 4 main pillars, high school students, university students, fresh graduates & Emiratis. Our platform allows youth to build a profile beyond a CV & Cover letter to include video pitches, certifications and allows them to showcase a portfolio of content. We offer AI tools that allow the youth to build Cvs & cover letters and we enable organizations to write job descriptions & convert them into downloadable video content. Our globally certified & easy to use assessments give youth deeper insights into personal & professional traits . YSpot supports organizations in hiring Emiratis ensuring that they fit culturally. We also partner with HR departments for 3 months ensuring the well-being of Emirati youth and a wider understanding of  Emirati culture within the organization. YSpot’s vision is  to build a sustainable economy through experiential learning, allowing youth to foster real-life skills. YSpot’s mission is to empower the next generation of skilled youth.
